column2: Have you ever been tested for HIV?
When did you have your most recent HIV test? Month
When did you have your most recent HIV test? Year
What was the result of your most recent HIV test?
I’m going to read you a list of reasons why some people have not been tested for HIV. Which of these best describes the most important reason you have not been tested for HIV in the past 12 months?
column17: 1 = You think you are at low risk for HIV infection?
column18: 2 = You were afraid of finding out that you had HIV?
